pullrequest.title: Record proof of concept (do not merge)

content.raw: If I'm not wrong, in the first case, we won't be able to receive the message if the subscriber is not linked against the custom message or has registered the descriptor in the descriptor pool. The string type is traveling over the wire (ign-transport sends it), the main problem is to compose the protobuf message. If the subscriber is linked against the custom message it should work (but we're in a similar case as with Ignition Msgs).
content.html: If I'm not wrong, in the first case, we won't be able to receive the message if the subscriber is not linked against the custom message or has registered the descriptor in the descriptor pool. The string type is traveling over the wire (ign-transport sends it), the main problem is to compose the protobuf message. If the subscriber is linked against the custom message it should work (but we're in a similar case as with Ignition Msgs).
